the point of B is to make it look

ballet can completely break you

eight and I started in level three with

it's definitely a dream come
true you have a very distinct ritual
when it comes to Performance and and
ballet can you tell me about that so
part of the ritual for me is a very set
routine for preparing your body and in
doing such a repetitive and specific
warm-up you also get your mind into that
sort of Zen Zone I just sit down close
my eyes and then I rehearse my dance in
my head sometimes I'll put in earbuds
but the music activates the muscle
memory when you're dancing I like to
visualize all the dance and go through
each step in my mind just thinking about
the movements and also really trying to
feel them in my body you do the ideal in
your head and hope it translates what

stakes for you as a student each
performance matters so much because you
just don't have as many and in the

stage it's a lot pressure the
visualization is so important because it
shows me what I'm going for what I'd
like the performance to be you know I
get really nervous so if my mind goes
blank on stage the muscle memory kind of
kicks in because your body recognizes
like what's going on and what's going to
happen what lessons have you learned
about success the most surprising thing
for me has just been that success can
come I mean when I started and I you
know was nowhere near the top of my
class I'd never imagined any of this I
really really fell in love with dance
when I discovered Classical Ballet and
it's kind of strange but what I like the
most about it is just how challenging it
is and the Improvement that you see is

you decide how hard you work and you
